content.rendered:
Methodology

Scrum-based translation process.

Transparent, fair, and argued discussions

Use of reliable Hebrew and Greek manuscripts.

Looking for and depending on the help of the Lord Jesus.

Use of modern tools and technology.

Goal: Deliver a reliable Bible translation within a reasonable time frame.

Lean management

Home
Review
